Did you know consumers spent $8.9 billion online during Black Friday 2021?😲

With more people expected to shop online this year, having a loyalty program is the best way to track and engage your e-commerce customers through the holidays and beyond. Here are some ways to get started:

👉 send compelling Black Friday Cyber Monday emails that outline sales and offers
👉 offer extra rewards points when new customers sign-up
👉 encourage repeat purchases with a discount on their next purchase

Want to get started with the perfect loyalty program for your brand? Learn more 👉 https://bit.ly/kangaroo-black-friday

October is the perfect time to create strong customer loyalty with Fall and Halloween themed offers. 

Not sure where to start? Check out some of the most popular October offers among Kangaroo customers 👇 

🎃15% Off Fall Themed Products/Food & Drinks
🎃Costume Photo Contest (for pets and humans!)
🎃Fang-tastic Flash Deals
🎃Urgent Discount Promotion (31% Off until Midnight. Hurry!)

For most businesses, the back-to-school season offers an opportunity for increased sales and repeat customers that will carry through to Black Friday.

Here are some great promotional ideas to get you inspired:

📝Loyal Customer Pre-Sale Campaign
📝Loyal Customer Discounts
📝Bundle Deals (e.x. Buy a large coffee, get 50% off any pastry)
